SEARCH
Package entity

Class BTOApplication

java.lang.Object
entity.BTOApplication
public class BTOApplication extends Object
The BTOApplication class represents an application for a Build-To-Order (BTO) flat.

This class maintains information about:

  • The applicant who submitted the application
  • The target BTO project
  • The application status tracking (PENDING, SUCCESSFUL, UNSUCCESSFUL, BOOKED, WITHDRAWN)
  • The selected and assigned flat types
  • Withdrawal request status

An application goes through various status changes during its lifecycle, from initial submission to eventual booking or withdrawal.

Version:
1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • BTOApplication

      public BTOApplication(Applicant applicant, BTOProject project, FlatType selectedFlatType)
      Constructs a new BTOApplication with the specified applicant, project, and flat type.

      New applications are automatically set to PENDING status with the current date/time.

      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant submitting the application
      project - The BTO project being applied for
      selectedFlatType - The flat type selected by the applicant

  • Method Details

    • getApplicant

      Gets the applicant who submitted this application.
      Returns:
      The applicant

      Gets the BTO project this application is for.

      Gets the flat type selected by the applicant during application.
      Returns:
      The selected flat type

    • getAssignedFlatType

      public FlatType getAssignedFlatType()
      Gets the flat type assigned by HDB Officer during booking.
      Returns:
      The assigned flat type, or null if not yet assigned

    • isWithdrawalRequested

      public boolean isWithdrawalRequested()
      Checks if a withdrawal request has been submitted for this application.
      Returns:
      true if withdrawal has been requested, false otherwise

    • setStatus

      public void setStatus(ApplicationStatus status)
      Updates the status of the application.
      Parameters:
      status - The new application status

    • requestWithdrawal

      public void requestWithdrawal()
      Marks this application as requesting withdrawal.

      The withdrawal is not immediate; it must be approved by an HDB Manager.

    • resetWithdrawalRequest

      public void resetWithdrawalRequest()
      Resets the withdrawal request flag, typically after a request is rejected.

    • canBook

      public boolean canBook()
      Determines if this application is eligible for booking a flat.

      Only SUCCESSFUL applications without pending withdrawal requests can be booked.

      Returns:
      true if the application can proceed to booking, false otherwise

    • setSelectedFlatType

      public void setSelectedFlatType(FlatType flatType)
      Updates the flat type selected by the applicant.
      Parameters:
      flatType - The new selected flat type

    • setAssignedFlatType

      public void setAssignedFlatType(FlatType flatType)
      Sets the flat type assigned by an HDB Officer during booking.

      This may differ from the selected type due to availability.

      Parameters:
      flatType - The flat type to assign

    • getProjectName

      public String getProjectName()
      Gets the name of the BTO project this application is for.
      Returns:
      The project name
